definition: Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

sentences.english: It is said that time is fleeting, it passes like this.
sentences.chinese: 是说时间如白驹过隙，逝者如斯。

sentences.english: All night long night oil lamp, I traveled difficult to sleep .
sentences.chinese: 油尽灯灭如斯长夜，我辗转难入睡。

sentences.english: It passes on just like this, not ceasing day or night!
Her unstable mind was what made her so vulnerable.
sentences.chinese: 她不安靖的意识致使她是如斯的亏弱虚弱。

sentences.english: Manhood is changing. It’s as simple, and as complicated, as that.
sentences.chinese: 男子气概，简单如此，复杂如斯。

sentences.english: So he prostrated and praised the Guru for such great favors.
sentences.chinese: 所以他敬礼与称赞上师给予他如斯大恩。

sentences.english: The temple system of worship had degenerated to the point that it had become worse than a sham.
sentences.chinese: 礼拜制度堕落如斯，竟比假作虔诚更恶。

sentences.english: I know people want to find out how I could be so selfish and so foolish.
sentences.chinese: 我知道人们都想知道为何我会如斯自私和愚蠢。

sentences.english: Yet, man choreographers will insist that you dance with your injury.
sentences.chinese: 尽管如斯，很多跳舞编导会对峙要你带伤跳舞。

sentences.english: Forcing a student teacher like Stambaugh to pretend to be straight?
sentences.chinese: 强迫实习老师如斯丹博去假装？

sentences.english: It was so before Song dynasty and Ming dynasty.
It is a great pleasure for me to introduce myself to you here.
sentences.chinese: 我是如斯的快乐在这儿向人人作毛遂自荐。

sentences.english: Trust, always can not stand test, is vulnerable to something like this.
sentences.chinese: 信任，老是经不起考验，显得如斯不堪一击。

sentences.english: Was grace that taught my heart to fear. And grace my fears relieved.
sentences.chinese: 如斯恩典，令心敬畏，解脱万千忧惧。

sentences.english: So much so, e-books are now outselling hardcovers.
sentences.chinese: 恰是由于如斯，电子书当初比精装书更为畅销。

definition: in the extreme (idiom)/incapable of further increase
were it not for/if not for
that being the case/then/in that case
